title: Demolition derby primaries: Senate races start to heat up
description: Nathan Gonzales, editor and publisher of Inside Elections and Bridget Bowman, deputy editor at the NBC News Political Unit, join Chuck to talk about primary races across the country, from Pennsylvania and Ohio to Georgia … even Oklahoma.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Nathan Gonzales, editor and publisher of Inside Elections and Bridget Bowman, deputy editor at the NBC News Political Unit, join Chuck to talk about primary races across the country, from Pennsylvania and Ohio to Georgia … even Oklahoma.
